name: feature-demo
description: IVA application to demo product features

scripts.run-dev: set DEBUG=koa*,neuron*,app:*,rc:*&& set PORT=8081&& set REDIS_HOST=127.0.0.1&& set REDIS_PORT=6379&& set VERSION=v0-1-0&& set project_id=ee-appeng-devtest&& set env=local&& nodemon index.js
scripts.integration-tests: set DEBUG=koa*,neuron*,app:*,rc:*&&set PORT=8081&& set ENV=local&& set VERSION=v0-1-0&& jest --env=node --forceExit --runInBand
scripts.integration-tests-no-output: set DEBUG=koa*,neuron*,app:*,rc:*&&set PORT=8081&& set REDIS_HOST=127.0.0.1&& set REDIS_PORT=6379&& set VERSION=v0-1-0&& jest --env=node --silent=true --forceExit --runInBand
